Oct   Landover Maryland USA Chicago Bears head coach Matt Eberflus stands on the sidelines against the Washington Commanders during the first quarter at FedExField PERIOD Mandatory Credit Geoff BurkeUSA TODAY Sports

The Chicago Bears fired running backs coach David Walker on Wednesday according to multiple reports PERIOD

Walker is the second assistant coach Chicago has parted with this season PERIOD Defensive coordinator Alan Williams resigned in September in a move coorchestrated by the teams HR department per multiple reports PERIOD

ESPN reported that human resources was also involved in the decision to fire Walker noting he violated workplace behavior protocol for a second time PERIOD

The Bears are fifth in the NFL in rushing PERIOD They do not employ an assistant running backs coach PERIOD

When Williams resigned Sept PERIOD  head coach Matt Eberflus took over the defensive playcalling PERIOD

Walker  joined the team when Eberflus was hired in  PERIOD He previously coached in the NFL with the Detroit Lions  and Indianapolis Colts  PERIOD
